nodes.text: Swift Hutt Spacer's Service Depot was a localized business in the city of Mos Eisley on the planet Tatooine. True to their name, the company offered quick repairs for a variety of spacecraft. The company was one of a myriad of small businesses owned by Jabba the Hutt during the height of the Galactic Empire.

Following Jabba's death in 4 ABY, an employee by the name of Kisa Shaki killed the pit boss and took over the facility. She immediately plunged into violent competition with Qes Dollis of the Sandstorm Shipping Concern as they both moved in on Jabba's smuggling operations.

The local Rebel cell, concerned on the effect the resulting gang war would have on the ordinary people of Mos Eisley, asked for help from a group of Alliance agents. When they confronted Kisa, she attempted to threaten them; failing that, she offered them places by her side, drawing a comparison between herself and Xim the Despot.
